heroSection.title: Mohamed Ashraf
heroSection.subtitle: Leader in Container Transport and Sea Freight
heroSection.description: We provide integrated, reliable shipping solutions using the latest technologies and the highest standards of quality and safety.

services.title: Sea Container Transport
services.description: Safe and efficient sea freight shipping services using global shipping lines with guaranteed delivery.

services.title: Express Air Freight
services.description: Fast air cargo services for urgent and sensitive goods, in partnership with top global airlines.

services.title: Customs Clearance
services.description: Professional customs clearance services to ensure smooth and fast cargo processing at borders.

services.title: Storage and Distribution
services.description: Modern storage facilities and smart distribution services with high transparency and efficiency.
